Parameterization¶

An example is placed in example/jmak/SCORE.Input.TemplateIron.uds.

Simulation¶

The sequential (MPI) simulation is issued by the following command line call:

mpiexec -n 1 score SCORE.Input.TemplateIron.uds 1

Output¶

The example/jmak folder provides a simple recrystallization case study of 1000 nuclei growing into a deformed monocrystal. The output contains several files, all of which have a prefix SCORE.<SimulationID> to make distinguishing results simple. Most output is plain ASCII formatted such that it can be directly imported in post-processing tools.
